name: Initiate of the Sky
description: You learned the secret knowledge of the winds and rain, and can command the spirits of the sky.

name: Initiate of the Earth
description: You learned the secret knowledge of rock and stone, and can command the spirits of the earth.

name: Initiate of the Forest
description: You learned the secret knowledge of root and branch, and can command the spirits of the forest.

name: Initiate of the Sea
description: You learned the secret knowledge of the tides and depths, and can command the spirits of the sea.
